entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
